author: cdupoirieux
msg: FOR-893 - We have encountered a strange problem with the pattern 'resolve.structurer.**'.
The {1} sometimes matches nothing, whereas {../1} is OK.
On the contrary, the {../1} sometimes matches nothing, whereas {1} is OK.
As a temporary workaround, we put {../1}{1} which covers all the cases.

author: fhanik
msg: Fixed chunked input filter to parse the header correctly. Performs strict parsing according to the RFC2616, so if the header is invalid it bails out.

author: jfclere
msg: Allow to use the new slotmem providers.
